newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Blue Square-Israel started. [corrected 17:55 gmt]
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Blue Square-Israel started. [corrected 17:55 gmt]

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch analyst Michael Harris said he initiated coverage of Blue Square-Israel Ltd with a near- and long-term accumulate rating (Corrects from buy rating).

-- "We believe the valuation is attractive relative to international comparables," he said. "It has an insignificant premium to the market," Harris said, adding that "it should be trading at a fairly substantial premium.
-- "The story is quite compelling with the company poised to continue gaining market share."
